docs.snippet: Twenty-five seconds, instead of 40, would make the game safer....
docs.lead_paragraph: Twenty-five seconds, instead of 40, would make the game safer.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by author Nate Jackson argues current measures to reduce risk of serious brain injury in pro football are insufficient; enumerates possible safety benefits of shortening play clock to 25 seconds and decreasing time between plays.

docs.snippet: The Browns have made an out-of-the-batter's box hire....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Browns have made an out-of-the-batter's box hire.

headline.main: Out of Batter's Box: Browns Hire Baseball Executive
headline.print_headline: Out of Batter's Box: Browns Hire Baseball Executive

docs.snippet: A top Moroccan intelligence official said on Tuesday that it was his country that put French and Belgian police on the trail of the network behind the November attacks in Paris that killed 130, and likely spared more lives by pinpointing the locat...
docs.lead_paragraph: A top Moroccan intelligence official said on Tuesday that it was his country that put French and Belgian police on the trail of the network behind the November attacks in Paris that killed 130, and likely spared more lives by pinpointing the location of the suspected ringleader.

headline.main: AP Interview: Morocco Had Key Intel Role After Paris Attacks
headline.print_headline: AP Interview: Morocco Had Key Intel Role After Paris Attacks
